#summary caches([actions,time])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ControllerInitializationFunctions Controller Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Tells Wheels to cache one or more actions.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *actions* || string || false ||   || Action(s) to cache ||
|| *time* || numeric || false || #application.settings.defaultCacheTime# || Minutes to cache the action(s) for ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset caches(actions="browseByUser,browseByTitle", time=30)>
}}}

*Related*:

 * [Caching Caching] (chapter)
